column5: For all of who are heading out with the kiddies tonight ... be safe!!  Have fun!!  And don't steal all the good stuff from your kids bags.     Randy
With all that grey hair Randy, you are starting to look like some of our mods   . Handsome that is of course (don't want to get kicked out).
You should go fishing in that outfit !  lol Nice costume !
Wow Randy. I hope that those wrinkles under your eyes are store bought.

Can you imagine the looks he`d get pulling up to the dock in that thing, or even better trolling past someone sitting on shore !!!!YIKES!!!!!!  A definate improvement Randy.......JK  nice make up.  Paul
We should all do a fishing outing wearing costumes lol
